certifications_list.title: Badan Nasional Sertifikasi Profesi - Programmer
certifications_list.description: Sertifikasi ini mengukuhkan kompetensi profesional dalam pengembangan perangkat lunak sesuai dengan standar Badan Nasional Sertifikasi Profesi (BNSP). Ini mencakup keahlian dalam penggunaan spesifikasi program, penulisan kode dengan prinsip guidelines dan best practices, implementasi pemrograman terstruktur dan berorientasi objek, penggunaan library atau komponen pre-existing, penerapan akses basis data, pembuatan dokumen kode program, debugging, serta pelaksanaan pengujian unit program.

certifications_list.organization: Bangkit led by Google, Goto, and Traveloka
certifications_list.title: Certification in Bangkit - Mobile Development
certifications_list.description: Intensive certification program in mobile application development.

certifications_list.title: MSIB - Studi Independen - Kampus Merdeka
certifications_list.description:
Selected as a cohort of the Bangkit Academy, a Kampus Merdeka Independent Study program led by Google, GoTo, and Traveloka, hosted by Dicoding Indonesia.
This program provided industry-level training focused on machine learning, cloud computing, and mobile development, combining technical skills, soft skills, and capstone project experience. Through this program, I gained practical expertise and prepared myself for a tech industry career.
